'Cut Off Your Hands (COYH)' is an indie pop band from New Zealand influenced
largely by post punk and indie pop groups such as The Smiths, Gang of Four,
Orange Juice, Talking Heads, as well as NZ post-punk of The Mint Chicks and This
Night Creeps.
